name: DeadOK
description:
The game tells you about grandpa's dream. He fell down the cave and, strangely, the way back disappeared. There is nothing left but only pass through lethal challenge. It was impossible at the first glance, but the magical cave gave him ability to reborn! Death is not an over anymore! And remember FAILURE IS PROGRESS !

A,D - move, Space - jump, esc - pause

The project was made by: 

Kami-Artist 2D 

ArkashaPugachev-Рrogrammer 

Umaru-Level designer

Hopeless-3d Artist.

Sounds:WOWIE Asset Pack, Free Sound.
